titles.title: A bill to amend section 2119 of title 18, United States Code, to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5821)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.
